pages.news2: Atlantic City Casinos Revenue Growth | Olimp News OlimpNews This is an exclusively news channel. 18+ news April 8, 2024 | 11:30 AM Atlantic City Casinos showed revenue growth of 1 %. According to the New Jersey state regulator, Atlantic City casinos increased their revenues by 1% compared to the same period last year. It is worth noting that the report did not take into account the Trump Taj Mahal casino, which was closed in October. The state's profit from online casinos is growing at a much faster pace and increased by 29.9% compared to last year. However, it is worth considering that in absolute terms it amounted to only USD 17.2 million. Prior to that, there was information that the state may allow online betting on horse racing at regional racetracks. Financial indicators show that after a while the revenues of online and offline casinos can be compared. Despite the developed entertainment infrastructure in the United States, online casinos are gaining an increasing audience and taking away a part of the market. Moreover, online casinos find it easier to acquire new customers, because all you need to do to play is go to the website. It is not yet known how long it will take for online casinos to become a serious force, and the question remains whether they will displace offline casinos or develop in parallel with them. pages.news3: First Casino Resort in the UAE | Olimp News OlimpNews This is an exclusively news channel. 18+ news July 9, 2023 | 12:45 PM The appearance of the first casino resort in the UAE has become known The Wynn Al Marjan Island resort in Ras Al Khaimah will open in early 2027. The first integrated gaming resort in the Middle East and North Africa region, Wynn Al Marjan Island in Ras Al Khaimah, will open in early 2027. This week, the developer published new images to assess the design and scale of the construction. The structure has already risen to a height of 40 meters above Al Marjan Island, the full height of the tower will be more than 300 meters, it will be completed in the fourth quarter of 2025. The resort tower will become a new attraction in Ras Al Khaimah and attract tourists from all over the world. The first resort with a casino is being built on an island with an area of almost 62 hectares. It will be surrounded by its own white sand beach, which will offer views of both the Persian Gulf and the Hajar Mountains. The hotel will offer 1,542 rooms and suites, including 22 private villas. The resort will house a variety of adult and children's pools, water entertainment facilities, as well as a 3.6-hectare tropical garden. The resort will include a shopping promenade with an area of 15 thousand square meters. m and a meeting and event center with an area of 7,500 sq. m. This will be the first Wynn Resort in the UAE. Currently, the WYNN chain owns and operates the resorts Wynn Las Vegas, Encore Boston Harbor, Wynn Macau and Wynn Palace, Cotai. pages.news4: Wynn Resorts Quarterly Results | Olimp News OlimpNews This is an exclusively news channel. 18+ news December 10, 2022 | 2:00 PM Wynn Resorts quarterly results beat forecasts Wynn Resorts beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter earnings on Tuesday as the growth of the gaming industry, luxury retail and hotel reservations contributed to steady demand for its hotels in Macau. The casino operator's shares rose 2.5% in extended trading. The "strong momentum" of resuming trips to casino hubs such as Las Vegas and Macau after the pandemic has been a tailwind for operators such as Wynn. "The strong momentum we saw in our business throughout 2023 continued to build during the first quarter," said CEO Craig Billings. Wynn received the largest share of income from its real estate in Macau, Wynn Palace and Wynn Macau. Income: According to LSEG, Wynn's operating revenue for the quarter ended March 31 was $1.86 billion (1.73 billion euros) compared with $1.42 billion (1.32 billion euros) last year and above the average analyst estimate of $1.27 billion (1.18 billion euros). Its quarterly adjusted earnings per share of $1.59 were above last year's 29 cents mark and beat analysts' estimates of $1.27 per share. Forbes Travel Guide: Wynn Resorts has more Forbes Travel Guide five-star awards than any other independent hotel company in the world. It offers award-winning restaurants, two award-winning spas, beauty salons and luxury shops. In 2024, Wynn Resorts was included in FORTUNE magazine's list of the most respected companies in the world. pages.news5: SJM Holdings Positive Free Cash Flow | Olimp News OlimpNews This is an exclusively news channel. 18+ news January 11, 2024 | 3:30 PM SJM Holdings to achieve positive free cash flow in 2024, says Fitch Fitch Ratings expects SJM Holdings Limited to have positive free cash flow (FCF) in 2024 with further growth in 2025-2026. This positive trend is expected to lead to a reduction in the debt balance from HK$29 billion (US$2.7 billion) at the end of September 2023 to HK$26 billion (US$3.3 billion) by the end of 2025 and to HK$23 billion (US$3 billion) by the end of 2026. In a recent investment memorandum, the rating agency raised the outlook for the long-term issuer default rating (IDR) of SJM Holdings Limited, a Hong Kong-registered company, in foreign currency from "Negative" to "Stable". The increase reflects a steady recovery in revenue from visits and gambling in Macau, despite the economic downturn in China. Fitch also notes that in the foreseeable future, SJM Holdings "will focus on deleveraging, as it adheres to a conservative financial policy." Fitch highlighted some key rating factors, including the rapid recovery in Macau attendance and gaming performance. "Total gross gaming revenue (GGR) reached 75 percent of 2019 levels in Q4 2023, as GGR for the mass market is likely to improve to over 100 percent of 2019 levels. Macau's attendance also continues to improve, with total visits reaching 89 percent of 2019 levels in November 2023, or 70 percent in 11 months of 2023. We expect moderate consistent improvement in 2024 as air traffic capacity in Hong Kong and Macau continues to normalize." pages.news6: The Most Memorable Casino Wins | Olimp News OlimpNews This is an exclusively news channel. 18+ offline-casino May 5, 2024 | 4:45 PM The casino winning stories that are remembered the most Another remarkable instance of a colossal casino triumph unfolded within the opulent confines of the Monte Carlo Casino & Resorts, now known as Park MGM. It was a momentous day on January 29, 2000, when Cynthia Jay, a waitress at the esteemed gambling establishment, decided to commemorate her mother-in-law's birthday with a stroke of luck at the slot machines. Fortune favored her as she approached the Megabucks machine, her heart brimming with anticipation. With each pull of the lever, excitement surged through her veins, until, on the ninth attempt, the reels aligned in perfect harmony, bestowing upon Cynthia a staggering jackpot of $35 million. This windfall catapulted her into the annals of gambling lore, marking one of the largest slot machine wins of its time. What makes this tale all the more extraordinary is the humble beginning from which Cynthia embarked on her journey to riches. With no more than $27 in her pocket, she embarked on a fateful adventure that forever altered the course of her life. Such tales of unexpected fortune serve as a testament to the allure of casinos, where dreams can materialize in the blink of an eye. Yet, amidst the glittering lights and tantalizing promises of wealth, it's essential to remember the inherent risks that accompany gambling. While luck may smile upon some, others may find themselves ensnared in its unforgiving grasp. Thus, let Cynthia's story serve as a cautionary reminder that while the thrill of gambling is undeniable, it's wise to approach it with tempered expectations and a keen awareness of its potential consequences.
